section.heading: Saving queries
section.item: All queries that you run are saved to your query history. Your query will be named query_x (where x increments for each query run)

It is also possible to save a query configuration with a name that you choose. Once you have added fields to the output fields list in the FlyMine query builder a box at the bottom will become available for you save your query with a specific name.
Saved queries can be accessed from your query history
